metadata.description: Flexible text component for paragraphs, spans, and inline elements with comprehensive styling options including sizes, weights, colors, alignments, and special formatting like lead paragraphs and inline code

accessibility.notes: Semantic HTML elements used (p, span, div). Supports ARIA attributes for enhanced accessibility.

responsive.notes: Lead paragraphs scale up on larger screens. All text uses relative units for responsive scaling.

usageExamples.title: Basic Body Text
usageExamples.code: {{ text({ content: 'This is body text with default styling.' }) }}

usageExamples.title: Lead Paragraph
usageExamples.code: {{ text({ content: 'This is a lead paragraph with increased size and spacing.', lead: true }) }}

usageExamples.title: Colored Text with Weight
usageExamples.description: Primary colored text with custom weight
usageExamples.code: {{ text({ content: 'Important message', color: 'primary', weight: 'semibold', size: 'lg' }) }}

usageExamples.title: Inline Span
usageExamples.description: Inline text element for use within other content
usageExamples.code: {{ text({ content: 'inline text', element: 'span', color: 'muted', size: 'sm' }) }}

usageExamples.title: Text with Inline Code
usageExamples.description: Body text containing inline code elements
usageExamples.code: {{ text({ content: 'Use the text component for all body copy.' }) }}

usageExamples.title: Centered Large Text
usageExamples.description: Centered text for headings or emphasis
usageExamples.code: {{ text({ content: 'Centered heading', align: 'center', size: 'xl', weight: 'bold' }) }}

usageExamples.title: Readable Paragraph
usageExamples.description: Paragraph with max-width constraint for optimal readability
usageExamples.code: {{ text({ content: 'Long paragraph text...', readable: true, lineHeight: 'relaxed' }) }}

aiHints.commonUseCase: Use for all body copy, paragraph text, captions, and inline text elements
whenToUse: Inline text elements with custom styling
Error messages, success messages, form helper text
whenNotToUse: Interactive text (use Link or Button component)

content.description: Text content to display (supports HTML for inline formatting like <code>, <strong>, <em>)

element.description: HTML element type to render - p for block paragraphs, span for inline text, div for generic containers

size.description: Text size variant using the type scale (xs: 9px, sm: 12px, base: 16px, lg: 21px, xl: 28px, 2xl: 38px)

weight.description: Font weight for emphasis (light: 300, normal: 400, medium: 500, semibold: 600, bold: 700)

color.description: Semantic color variant for different contexts (default: body text, muted: de-emphasized, primary/secondary: brand colors, error/success: status colors)

lineHeight.description: Line height for different reading contexts (tight: 1.25, snug: 1.375, normal: 1.5, relaxed: 1.625, loose: 2.0)

lead.description: Apply lead paragraph styling (larger size, increased line height, extra bottom margin)

readable.description: Apply max-width constraint (65 characters) for optimal reading length

truncate.description: Truncate text with ellipsis when it exceeds container width

attributes.description: Additional HTML attributes to apply to the element

ariaDescribedBy.description: ID of element that describes this element

role.description: ARIA role override (use sparingly, semantic HTML preferred)
